amendment.description: Amendment requires that projects receiving grants under the bill include a drug-alcohol education component and information about the transmission of AIDS and the HIV factor.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 5 printed in H. Rept. 106-463 to require that education about alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs and the effects of abusing such substances and information about HIV/AIDS and its transmission be made available to each individual participating in the project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
